metadata.name: Linux Crypto Mining Indicators
metadata.comment: Detects command line parameters or strings often used by crypto miners

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --cpu-priority=')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--donate-level=0')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o pool.')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --nicehash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --algo=rx/0 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stratum+tcp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stratum+udp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sh -c /sbin/modprobe msr allow_writes=on')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ls1kb25hdgutbgv2zww9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0tzg9uyxrllwxldmvsp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tlwrvbmf0zs1szxzlbd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c3ryyxr1bst0y3a6ly')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('n0cmf0dw0rdgnwoi8v')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zdhjhdhvtk3rjcdovl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c3ryyxr1bst1zha6ly')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('n0cmf0dw0rdwrwoi8v')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zdhjhdhvtk3vkcdovl'))))

output.summary: Detects command line parameters or strings often used by crypto miners
